Leaders Launch Pool Nation Network Multiplayer:
1) Run GreenLuma / Steam.
2) Run the file from the c Pool.exe game.
3) In the game press Enter => Online => Player Match =>

Create the server to the Game:
1) Create Match => Choose detailed settings Multiplayer => Continue => waiting to enter the second player or send him an invitation by using the Invite Friend. => We readiness and start the game.

Connecting to the game:
1) Search => If you want to choose the criteria => Continue => We go to an available server => announce the availability and forward to.
